name: Escape Gravity (0Left)
description:
This game is about a spy who is infiltrating the moon base, after collecting the data he needs. He needs to escape without contacting the security drones in order to return to Earth-19.

With a gravity-reversing clock as his only weapon, we're relying on Agent 84 to find out what's going on.

I used the following assets and would like to thanks very much to the artists

- https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset - By:  0x72

- https://grinlane.itch.io/clean-dungeons-tileset - By:  Grinlane

- https://ankousse26.itch.io/free-pixel-art-buttons - By:  ankousse26

- https://xanderwood.itch.io/ui-buttons - By:  Xanderwood

font: https://www.dafont.com/pt/alagard.font

Be my guest to see the progress of this project in the repo:  https://github.com/0Left/Jam_Project_Dualidade
